1.1.name: wordpress/telephone-number-linker
1.1.description:
This plugin allows you to turn a phone number on your site into a link that only appears clickable for mobile phone users. This means mobile device users can click the number to call it, but desktop users won't see it as a link - so won't be taken to an error screen that they would normally when clicking on a phone number link. Some iOS and Android devices make numbers clickable by default - but not all do. If your client calls saying her ancient phone won't call a number on his site when she clicks on it this is the plugin for you.

Telephone Number Linker Features

Uses up-to-date list of browsers to detect that the visitor is using a mobile device. In that case loads a jQuery script to enclose the telephone number in a link.
